subject: [sugar] Hippo canvas bug
body:
With the latest sugar git we are hitting an hippo bug which will cause
segfaults when moving between zoom levels. Here is a patch:

http://dev.laptop.org/~marco/set_root.patch

I'll get it in jhbuild as soon as the mugshot guys review it.
